title: On Sacred Ground
creator_credit: Oliver Howes, Robin Hughes, Film Australia and National Film and Sound Archive of Australia
brief_description: Discusses the controversial question of Aboriginal land rights. Deals with the arguments to preserve sacred sites versus the Australian government’s agreements with mining companies. Concentrates on the situation at the Noonkanbah Station in Western Australia. Suitable for upper secondary level.
